name: 翁明群
objective:
窗型空調、箱型空調、中央空調、除濕空調、及各型空調實習、運輸空調實習、各種空調過程實驗及空氣性質點之測定、空調熱回收裝置。
To familiarize students with practice of room air conditioner, package air conditioner, central air conditioning system, dehumidifying air conditioning system, etc. To provide students with abilities of experiment of air conditioning processes and measurement of air properties.
